name: Weapon Match
description:
• Slide the mouse to connect weapons of the same type to eliminate. 
  • Eliminated weapons will shoot at monsters and kill them. 
  • Scores are awarded for eliminating weapons and killing monsters. 
  • The monster will come to the village, and after reaching the village, it will attack once and disappear, with 1 HP per attack. 
  • Villages have 6 HP. The game ends when the village's HP is 0.
  • Get as many scores as possible before the game ends.
